types.html:
selon que

  1. according as, depending on whether, according to whether
    Synonym: suivant que

Usage notes

[edit]
  • Usually followed by a verb in the indicative, though use of the subjunctive is becoming more common.
trans: according as, depending on whether, according to whether

title: selon que
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /sə.lɔ̃ kə/
